      • get

        public Iterable<LiblouisHyphenator> get(org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common.Query query)
        Recognized features: - hyphenator: Will only match if the value is `liblouis' - table or liblouis-table: A liblouis table is a list of URIs that can be either a file name, a file path relative to a registered tablepath, an absolute file URI, or a fully qualified table identifier. The tablepath that contains the first `sub-table' in the list will be used as the base for resolving the subsequent sub-tables. This feature is not compatible with other features except `hyphenator' and `locale'. - locale: Matches only hyphenators with that locale. Other features are passed on to lou_findTable.
        Specified by:
        get in interface org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common.Provider<org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common.Query,LiblouisHyphenator>
